text: María Isabel Verdú Rollán (born 2 October 1970) (), is a Spanish actress. She played Luisa in Alfonso Cuarón's 2001 movie, Y tu mamá también and Mercedes in Guillermo del Toro's 2006 movie, Pan's Labyrinth. In March 2021, she was cast as Barry Allen/The Flash's mother Nora Allen on the upcoming DC Extended Universe movie The Flash (2023). ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Actors from Madrid
title: Maribel Verdú
